open.title: Frogfoot| Southern Nodes
open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Grahamstown, Garden Route District Municipality, Oudtshoorn, George, Mossel Bay, and Cape Town. Affected clients will experience no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience.

open.title: Vuma Reach| Devland
open.description: Vuma Reach has informed us of a network outage affecting Devland. Affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vuma Reach engineers are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: FibreSuburb| The Wrens
open.description: FibreSuburb has informed us of a network outage affecting The Wrens. Affected clients will experience no connectivity. FibreSuburb engineers are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience.

open.title: FrogFoot outage | Eastern and Western Cape Degraded
open.description: FrogFoot has informed us of a network outage affecting the Eastern and Western Cape. Affected clients will experience intermittent to no connectivity. FrogFoot engineers are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience.

updates.content: The network outage has been resolved. We will continue to monitor to ensure stability.

Changes have been implemented to stabilize the service. However, additional underlying issues have been identified. The Frogfoot core team is actively working to resolve these issues. Thank you for your patience.
Vendor and Frogfoot Engineering Teams are actively troubleshooting and we will provide more updates as they progress.
Frogfoot has identified a bug that is causing the issue. An upgrade is planned to address and resolve it. Further updates will be provided as they become available.
Frogfoot is still investigating internally. More updates will be shared
Frogfoot technicians have arrived at the data centre with the replacement hardware and are busy with installation.

Frogfoot core network teams have physically rebooted the switches in the data centre but this has not resolved the issue. Frogfoot maintenance teams are en route to the data centre to replace the faulty hardware. No ETR is currently available. We apologise for the issues experienced.
Frogfoot core network engineers are still at the datacentre actively working on resolving the outage.
Frogfoot technicians are at the datacentre further troubleshooting the ongoing intermittent to no service issue.
Frogfoot tier 3 and network core engineers are actively working on restoring the services affected.
FrogFoot tier 3 and network core teams are still investigating the root cause of the ongoing intermittent service. We apologise for the issues experienced.
